alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 8:18AM EST until January 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small accumulations of freezing rain possible. Total ice accumulations of one tenth of an inch up to one quarter of an inch are possible. The best chance for accumulating ice will exist west of I-95. * WHERE...Portions of northeast South Carolina and southeast North Carolina. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Small accumulations of freezing rain are possible on elevated surfaces such as bridges and overpasses which could create hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
